name: BLOW FISH
description:
Game about blowing a blowfish

GDL 25th Jam Submission
Can be completed in around 5 minutes.

IN CASE THE CONTROLS DO NOT WORK PLEASE RELOAD THE PAGE

CONTROLS:
BLOW FISH and STEER FISH - Left/Right Arrow keys | A/D Keys
LAUNCH FISH - Down Arrow key | S Key
BLOW FISH UP - R Key (in case something goes wrong)

Made with https://heaps.io/ in 2 days

Font at the endcard is m3x6 by Daniel Linssen https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
